name: Twugo
description: Twugo is a curious little Pokemon that loves to explore the mysterious cave-like environments it calls home. It is incredibly inquisitive and can often be found flitting about, using its Psychwave ability to sense and observe its surroundings. It has a playful, mischievous personality and loves to hide in small nooks of its environment to surprise unsuspecting passersby.
image_prompt: a chibi cute psychic-type hawk pokemon, in a cave environment, dreamlike background, anime chibi drawing style, pastel background --niji --ar 3:2
